channel.title: Project RuneLord beta - UPDATE2
channel.description:
This project failed before due to my gay source that kept freezing everyone. This time it wont be an rsps, well it will but the weapons will be from call of duty. I got this idea from Nazi Zombies on World at War..
[b]Game Features:[/b] It will be private wich means it wont be a online game.. although the RuneLord Live will be coming any time soon. The game is all a story one quest, once you finish it you will be able to mess around zombies and play zombie minigames including nazi zombies :P
[b]Game information:[/b] You will start out in tutorial island where your military commander orders you to go check out an area thats been destroyed from the zombie invasion, you will start out with a colt. You will need to find out how to get your way through the ruins untill you get to the Resistants Camp, you will need to do a few objectives, the resistants camp leader will tell you how to keep yourself from getting killed and probably assign you to do some quests wich he will teleport you to. The game will have only one quest wich will be the whole story, every step you go through the quest tab(called your journal wich will have its own picture sprite soon) will update.
People who work in our project: Mark(me): I will be working on: coding, RuneLord Live and RuneLord(standard) Mike: I will be working on: Modeling guns, equipment and Extra Coder.
Staff Application Form: *Note you must have coding skills and must be the age of 13 and more. Name: Age: Proffision: Country of Region: MSN: Amount of time doing what your spot is: What you will do at that spot:
Beta-testing Aplication Form: Name: Age: Msn: Country of Region:
We need: Coder,Loads of beta testers,Modelers(who can model guns).
[b]I will be allowing you to work with me on January so always be tuned or YOU WILL loose your spot.[/b]
[b]UPDATE: The server will have guns, ignore first update.[/b]
[b]UPDATE2: Colt and Thompson also MP40 are done.[/b]

item.title: Project RuneLord beta - UPDATE2
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:2, topic:367848”]Could you add more information to your topic? such as proof media pictures (not right away if you can’t) etc.

thanks.[/quote]
I will trying to get pictures up, but right now im coding my ass off.

Thanks for your support, it will be challenging your right…

Read full topic

item.title: Project RuneLord beta - UPDATE2
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:8, topic:367848”][quote author=QuestMaster 2K10 link=topic=463994.msg3393824#msg3393824 date=1289158100]
Add more information. This sounds nothing like RuneScape. So why call it an RSPS?
[/quote]

It doesn’t have to be an RSPS development for it to be in this section. It can be anything really.[/quote]

I am pretty sure you still have to use the RS2 protocol to be considered a “Server Development” in the “Runescape 2 Server Emulation” board.

Read full topic

[/quote]

It doesn’t have to be an RSPS development for it to be in this section. It can be anything really.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:367848”][quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=463994.msg3393795#msg3393795 date=1289157172]
This seems to look like to be one of those great-idea-but-wont-actually-happen projects.
I’m not sure how you’ll manage everything, but good luck.
[/quote]
This and I do believe this idea is quite similar to the one on R-S.[/quote]
Yeah it is, the one on R-S is first person shooter though Best of luck with this project, it will be challenging.

Read full topic

This time it wont be an rsps, well it will but the weapons will be from call of duty.

Game Features:
It will be private wich means it wont be a online game… although the RuneLord Live will be coming any time soon.
The game is all a story one quest, once you finish it you will be able to mess around zombies and play zombie minigames including nazi zombies

You will start out in tutorial island where your military commander orders you to go check out an area thats been destroyed from the zombie invasion, you will start out with a colt.
You will need to find out how to get your way through the ruins untill you get to the Resistants Camp, you will need to do a few objectives, the resistants camp leader will tell you how to keep yourself from getting killed and probably assign you to do some quests wich he will teleport you to.
The game will have only one quest wich will be the whole story, every step you go through the quest tab(called your journal wich will have its own picture sprite soon) will update.
